actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil Service and General Services.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Office of Personnel Management, VA, Health and Human Services Department.
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from Defense Department (General Counsel).
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from VA.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service, Post Office, and General Services

official_title: A bill to amend section 2108 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain commissioned officers of the Public Health Service are preference eligibles for the purposes of such title.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Revises the definitions of "veteran" and "preference eligible" under specified provisions of Federal law concerning Federal employment to provide veterans' preference to commissioned Public Health Service officers who served during the Vietnam era.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2108 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain commissioned officers of the Public Health Service are preference eligibles for the purposes of such title.
